overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a diverse social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers. Engagement levels vary across platforms, with content related to research announcements and academic opportunities receiving significant interaction.

contentThemes.description: Posts announcing new research papers, grants, and updates on ongoing projects.
Posts about job openings, postdoctoral positions, and PhD opportunities.
Posts about participating in or presenting at academic conferences.

recommendations: Increase frequency of posts announcing research outcomes and academic opportunities to boost follower engagement.
Utilize more interactive content like polls or Q&A sessions to enhance engagement on less active platforms.

platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon posts show moderate engagement, with technical updates and discussions generating interest.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn is the most engaging platform, particularly for research announcements and career opportunities.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
